Texts.Eng:
_____________________________________________________
  ^cyan;New in version 5.6.216^reset;

  * added 'reagent' tag to bees (drone and queen of all types)
  
  * Starmint description corrected (XDGrangerDX)
  
  * Skittles has been tweaked (Kherae)
  
  * fixed some grammar/typos
  
  * telebrium boomerang status effect corrected
  
  * Gorgoliths should be easier to find
  
  * Precursor Databox adjusted. It is no longer a container in the traditional sense and now generates research
  
  * ^red;FU techs have added Research costs when crafting^reset; per tier: (200/350/500/750/1100/2200/3500/5000)
    
  * all red sand variants should properly sift 
  
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; - Personal Computer and Advanced Computer objects. These generate research slowly.
    
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; - animated Talking glitch for stations/quests (Ycar)
  
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; -  Precursor themed ship parts. Drops in precursor loot pools
  
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; -  Fuel Tank for BYOS (TotalBlazing)
  
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; -  ship antennae deco (TotalBlazing)
  
  * 'Silicon Knight' quest now requires 1, not 10 , silicon as its text implies.
  
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; -  Slime race NPCs (thx to Xel and hieru_chan) 
  
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; -  farmable Shoats to Gelatinous biomes (from slime race mod) (thx to Xel and hieru_chan)
  
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; -  slime race weapons/gear with FU adjustments (thx to Xel and hieru_chan)
  
  * ^yellow;New!^reset; - animation states to Kevin and Vinj speech graphics for radiomessages as well as additional characters (Ycar)

  * ^green;Update byos to support variations of default ships^reset; : ^orange;This way other mods can modify what the default ships capabilities are^reset; without having to modify or extend the fu_byosai.lua script. (ColonolNutty)
  
  * Swarm Guns have been -heavily- rebalanced. They are no longer the most powerful weapons in the game.
  
  * You can now create ^green;'research voxels'^reset; at the ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;
  
  * Goods in the Science Outpost radien shops are cheaper
  
  * submarines will no longer function properly in liquids that are not like water
  

_____________________________________________________
  ^cyan;New in version 5.6.214^reset;

  * The poptop cavern gate can now detect your tricorder if it's in an essential item slot
  
  * corrected an erroneous line in the Transmutation Matrix preventing it from upgrading gear. it should properly function now!
  
_____________________________________________________
  ^cyan;New in version 5.6.210^reset;
  
  * Bounty Hunter set bonus should properly apply
  
  * Bounty Hunter set should now be dyeable
  
  * corrects Transmutation Matrix upgrade failing to find itself to allow upgrading
  
_____________________________________________________
  ^cyan;New in version 5.6.209^reset;
  
  * Moved the tricorder check to the poptop cavern gate from the ancient console and improved it's code a bit (Hubnester)
  
  * Made the quest to get the tricorder basically complete it for anyone within a 500 block radius of someone who completes it (Hubnester)
  
  * Changed the starbooze npc to use a new behaviour instead of modifying a vanilla one for it (Hubnester)
  
  * added Adv.Alloy, Zerchesium, Xithricite, Hellfire rapiers (Ycar)
  
  * added some new Crew Bed types
  
  * Gives more races racialiser support (Hubnester)
  
  * added some new sounds to Tricorder modes. Each has a distinct tone
  
  * Trianglium katana added
  
  * Apiary positioning corrected 

  * Improves the BYOS ship slightly (hubnester)
  
  * Updates the music player music list (hubnester)
  
  * Adds racialiser support to more races (hubnester)
  
  * Removes some redundancies from universe_server.config.patch (hubnester)
  
  * NOTE: THIS UPDATE WILL CAUSE ISSUES IF YOU HAVE SOMETHING THAT MAKES THE COSMIC CRUCIBLE OBTAINABLE (hubnester)

_____________________________________________________
  ^cyan;New in version 5.6.208^reset;

* NEW : Scan to Interact mechanic. Will be implemented soon. (zimberzimber)
  
* similar to quarries, higher level pumps now work faster (Khe)

* Fixed a bug causing pumps to cease working (Khe)

* fixed a small item instancing error caused by trying to drop fractional items (Khe)

* fixed a bug in lootbox script

* Fixed being able to get free upgrades with upgrade kit by opening the pane and dropping the upgrade kit. (zimberzimber)

* Item list now displays real item name for RNG weapons (zimberzimber)

* new Aether microdungeons (Aelfgifu)

* wire relay now states that its first input controls its active state. no functional change. (Khe)
_____________________________________________________
  ^cyan;New in version 5.6.207^reset;
  
  * some small behavioral adjustments made to War-Born
  
  * updated Erchibud visuals to include a more thematic eye
  
  * adjusted quest-group rewards in the Tricorder
  
  * Transmutation Matrix added
  
  * new look for Apiaries and Giant Apiaries
  
  * Quarries are now tiered (copper / iron / titanium / densinium)

  * Pumps are now tiered (copper / iron / titanium / densinium)

  * better math for Pong (cat2002)
  
  * new alt for Xithricite Bow
  
  * Primus armor bonuses corrected and adjusted
  
  * Bug House appears in proper tab in the foraging station
  
  * the Mech unlock quest is now available immediately upon entering the Outpost
  
  * Plasma Gun alt fire improved
  
  * Panishment tweaked and added to loot pools
  
  * Remote Grenade launcher should no longer appear as a PGI
  
  * fixed categories on the new precursor pistols. they should sort properly, but retain their category label.
  
  * ITDs will no longer accept zero as a valid input.
  
 _____________________________________________________
  ^cyan;New in version 5.6.206^reset;
  
  * Adds precursor stair tile 
  
  * Adds precursor databox and assocaited microdungeon (Aelfgifu)
  
  * corrects some issues with hair styles in the wrong colors
  
  * adds Panishment (Khe)
  
  * corrects some Precursor weapons missing Precursor tag for set bonuses (Khe)
  
  * corrects some miscategorized pipes (Khe)
  
  * Bunnything shouldn't crash the Creatures collection
  
  * bot spawner objects now create pods that work right. (Khe)
  
  * Snub Gun improved: 
    - baseDps increased (8.5 -> 9.5) (1.7 -> 1.9 per shot)
    - shot speed increased (55 -> 60)
    - burstTime increased by +0.05 (0.035 to 0.04)
  
  * Nomad armor set improved. It now provides +15% rather than +10% to damage with Daggers. It now also applies to Short Spears. It's tooltip is less verbose, too.
  * robots and lithovores can now enjoy Rust Chowder and Oil Stew
  
  * Lunari Katana now has the Lunari tag for set bonuses
  
  * Lunari Scythe now has the Lunari tag for set bonuses
  
  * added 4 Thelusian melee weapons
  
  * Precursor Quantum Fluid has less overall value when using converters, and will be a bit less simple to produce.
  
  * Faulty converters create vastly less Crunchy Chicks
  
  * Remote Grenade Launcher should now show its stats
